context: Believes in employing well trained, highly knowledgeable and skilled staff to deliver high quality services through conducting research and confidently advocating for best practices in natural resource management.
KWG gives due importance to working together to achieve a common objective, respecting each otherâ€™s contribution, realizing and appreciating that togetherness is prime to accomplishment of tasks.
KWG believes in being open in all ways and at all times, telling the truth, ensuring that resources are effectively and efficiently used, in the interest of every one.
KWG places high value on the preservation of life, property, and the environment.
KWG expects its members and other networks/partnerships to conduct themselves in a manner beyond reproach.
